tool.name: PDAUG Uversky Plot
tool.description: Uversky plot to analyze ordered and disordered proteins
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This plot divides analyze peptide sequences on globular and IDP subsets based on their mean net charge versus mean hydropathy. The line represents the permeable boundary between both subsets.
-----
**Inputs** * **--Fasta1** The first fasta file. * **--Fasta2** The second fasta file.
-----
**Outputs** * Return html file.
